full_text:
Re: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
From
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C) "USANYS"
To
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Date
2019/07/07 18:39
Subject:
Re: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Attachments:
Mime.822
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Thanks so much for the quick response (and solution).
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
hould be able to get back to MCC in about 30 minutes so should be all set, and I'll let you know if he reaches out to me with any issues.
thanks again,
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
On Jul 7, 2019, at 18:28,
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
wrote:
He's in with an attorney now (not sure which) but I cleared
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
to go in too.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From:
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
(USANYS)
Date:
7/7/19 6:18 PM (GMT-05:00)
To:
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Subject:
RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
>>>
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
(USANYS)
07/07/2019 18:18 >>>
Massachusetts
From:
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Sent:
Sunday, July 07, 2019 18:18
To:
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
(USANYS)
Subject:
Re: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Sorry
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
just seeing this now. Where is he barred?
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

Page 13771
DOJ-OGR-00024303
